nodes.documentation:
@title GasPriceLimitFundraiser
 * @dev This fundraiser allows to set gas price limit for the participants in the fundraiser
nodes.name: GasPriceLimitFundraiser

nodes.documentation: @dev This function puts the initial gas limit
nodes.name: initializeGasPriceLimitFundraiser

nodes.documentation: @dev This function allows the owner to change the gas limit any time during the fundraiser
nodes.name: changeGasPriceLimit

nodes.documentation: @dev The transaction is valid if the gas price limit is lifted-off or the transaction meets the requirement
nodes.name: validateTransaction

nodes.name: validateTransaction
